events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the smartphone has a cracked screen and doesn't turn on at all. I want this issue fixed as soon as possible.
The issue reported involves a broken product, specifically a cracked screen and a smartphone that fails to power on.
Assigning a customer service representative specialized in product defects for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your smartphone. I’m here to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged screen and the smartphone’s serial number? This will help us process your case faster.
Here are the pictures showing the cracked screen clearly. The serial number is SN123456789. Please advise what to do next.
Thank you for the information. We can offer a replacement smartphone shipped to you within 3 business days or a full refund if you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement device sent as soon as possible. Thank you for the prompt response.
We have processed your replacement order and you will receive a tracking number shortly. Your case has been resolved.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement smartphone and that everything is working well.
Yes, I received the new phone today and it works perfectly. Thanks for your help and fast service!
Closing this case as the replacement was received and the issue has been fully resolved to the customer's satisfaction.
